title: SNC
text:
git sync folder lapsi-mini
added, init
mini received
git clone local.git to temp/gitmini
edit on mini
pushed on mini
lapsi pull, received
edit on lapsi
flaw in post-receive, didnt deploy, corrected
missing deploy dir
still 128
wrong dir again. wks.






edit bela
working copy did only commit, not pushed? why? tried wt ulysses, there push button in commit dialogue is there…
wc has to add remote origin mini, then push appears…
positron ssh host window wks. via id automatic, change into temp/gitmini > pull, changes appear. sh pushmini.sh


fa include by      weui  fa arrow left    include




a lot of icon essais.

added quarto render to post-receive, wks. if pushed from mini self. now try from lapsi.
